'''Brant''' â€‹is a minor character in the [[Season 5|fifth]] season.<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/season-five-casting-news-updates/]</ref> He is played by [[Jonathan Byrne]]. Brant is a member of the [[Night's Watch]].
